doc:
Rita Cadillac https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rita_Cadillac 0 Rita Cadillac (born Nicole Yasterbelsky; 18 May 1936, Paris – 5 April 1995, Deauville) was a French dancer, singer, and actress. Cadillac started her music career as an accordionist under the alias "Rita Rella" at the age of 13. In 1952, she was a pin-up model and took the name "Rita Cadillac" (possibly as an allusion to her prominent breasts) at Crazy Horse where she began to work as an exotic dancer. She was also a dancer of Folies Bergère in the 1950s. Cadillac appeared in many French films such as Soirs de Paris (1954), Porte océane (1958), La prostitution (1962), Un clair de lune à Maubeuge (1962), and Any Number Can Win (1963), becoming a renowned figure throughout Europe. In 1981, she appeared in the miniseries and film Das Boot, as the club singer Monique, in the town of La Rochelle. Rita_Cadillac ( born Nicole_Yasterbelsky ; 18_May_1936 , Paris – 5_April_1995 , Deauville ) was a_French_dancer , singer , and actress . Cadillac started her_music_career as an_accordionist under the_alias " Rita_Rella " at the_age of 13 . In 1952 , she was a_pin-up_model and took the_name " Rita_Cadillac " ( possibly as an_allusion to her_prominent_breasts ) at Crazy_Horse where she began_to_work as an_exotic_dancer . She was also a_dancer of Folies_Bergère in the_1950s . Cadillac appeared in many_French_films such_as Soirs de Paris_(_1954_)_,_Porte_océane_(_1958_) , La_prostitution_(_1962_)_,_Un_clair de lune_à_Maubeuge ( 1962_) , and Any_Number Can_Win (_1963_) , becoming a_renowned_figure throughout Europe . In 1981 , she appeared in the_miniseries_and_film_Das_Boot , as the_club_singer_Monique , in the_town of La_Rochelle .
